00094 #if !defined(__x86_64__)
00095 # ifdef  __ia64__
00096 #  define CDEBUG_STACK() (THREAD_SIZE -                                 \
00097                           ((unsigned long)__builtin_dwarf_cfa() &       \
00098                            (THREAD_SIZE - 1)))
00099 # else
00100 #  define CDEBUG_STACK() (THREAD_SIZE -                                 \
00101                           ((unsigned long)__builtin_frame_address(0) &  \
00102                            (THREAD_SIZE - 1)))
00103 # endif /* __ia64__ */
00104 
00105 #define __CHECK_STACK(msgdata, mask, cdls)                              \
00106 do {                                                                    \
00107         if (unlikely(CDEBUG_STACK() > libcfs_stack)) {                  \
00108                 LIBCFS_DEBUG_MSG_DATA_INIT(msgdata, D_WARNING, NULL);   \
00109                 libcfs_stack = CDEBUG_STACK();                          \
00110                 libcfs_debug_msg(msgdata,                               \
00111                                  "maximum lustre stack %lu\n",          \
00112                                  CDEBUG_STACK());                       \
00113                 (msgdata)->msg_mask = mask;                             \
00114                 (msgdata)->msg_cdls = cdls;                             \
00115                 dump_stack();                                           \
00116               /*panic("LBUG");*/                                        \
00117         }                                                               \
00118 } while (0)
00119 #define CFS_CHECK_STACK(msgdata, mask, cdls)  __CHECK_STACK(msgdata, mask, cdls)
00120 #else /* __x86_64__ */
00121 #define CFS_CHECK_STACK(msgdata, mask, cdls) do {} while(0)
00122 #define CDEBUG_STACK() (0L)
00123 #endif /* __x86_64__ */
00124 
00130 #define CFS_CURPROC_COMM_MAX (sizeof ((struct task_struct *)0)->comm)
00131 
00132 /* helper for sysctl handlers */
00133 int lprocfs_call_handler(void *data, int write, loff_t *ppos,
00134                          void __user *buffer, size_t *lenp,
00135                          int (*handler)(void *data, int write,
00136                          loff_t pos, void __user *buffer, int len));

00142 /*
00143  * Macros to access common characteristics of "current" UNIX process.
00144  */
00145 #define current_pid()             (current->pid)
00146 #define current_comm()            (current->comm)
00147 
00148 /* check if task is running in compat mode.*/
00149 int current_is_32bit(void);
